CUSTOM_MODAL.MODAL_DESC: In the final step, we will be sharing with you the coverage you need based on our assessment.

COMMISSION.TITLE: Commission Rebate
COMMISSION.MESSAGE:
We rebate up to 50% of the first-year basic commission that we receive from the insurer when you purchase a policy through us.
This excludes an admin charge of $26.75 per policy and is limited to the period that the insurer pays us commission.

RATING.TITLE: Insurer’s Financial Strength Rating
RATING.MESSAGE:
This is a forward-looking opinion about the financial security characteristics of an insurance company with respect to its ability to pay under its insurance policies and contracts in accordance with their terms.
S&P Rating
Description
AAA
The insurer rated 'AAA' has extremely strong financial security characteristics.
AA+ AA AA-
An insurer rated 'AA' has very strong financial security characteristics, differing only slightly from those rated higher.
A+ A A-
An insurer rated 'A' has strong financial security characteristics but is somewhat more likely to be affected by adverse business conditions than are insurers with higher ratings.
BBB+ BBB BBB-
An insurer rated 'BBB' has good financial security characteristics but is more likely to be affected by adverse business conditions than are higher-rated insurers.
Source: http://www.standardandpoors.com/RATINGSDIRECT

RECOMMENDATIONS.TITLE: Recommendations
RECOMMENDATIONS.DESCRIPTION: Personalise your insurance coverage by selecting the plans you are interested in.
RECOMMENDATIONS.CHOOSE_OPTIONS: Choose one of these options to continue:
RECOMMENDATIONS.DISCLAIMER: Note: Premiums quoted are only an estimate based on certain parameters and may differ depending on individual's profile, specific needs and changes by the insurers. For Hospital Plan, the premium shown does not include the premium for MediShield Life.
RECOMMENDATIONS.SEND_QUOTE_DESC: Submit your interest below to find out more from our Client Adviser.

TRANSFER_INSTRUCTION.TITLE: Payment Instructions
TRANSFER_INSTRUCTION.DESCRIPTION: You may do a Bank Transfer or PayNow to make payment.
TRANSFER_INSTRUCTION.FAQ: For more information, visit our FAQs.
TRANSFER_INSTRUCTION.TOP_UP_REQUEST_LBL: You do not have any Top Up Requests.
TRANSFER_INSTRUCTION.TRANSFER_INSTRUCTION_LBL: Please transfer using Bank Transfer or PayNow.
TRANSFER_INSTRUCTION.NOTE: IMPORTANT! You MUST indicate your MoneyOwl Registered Mobile Number as Payment Description under “Remarks / Descriptions / Comments” to ensure that you receive your report. Please email clientsupport@moneyowl.com.sg if you have not done so.

SHOW_TRANSACTION_STEPS.LBL_STEP_1: Log in to your internet banking or mobile banking app of a Singapore registered bank.
SHOW_TRANSACTION_STEPS.LBL_STEP_2: Select an account of your own (registered under your name) to transfer from and enter the amount to transfer.
SHOW_TRANSACTION_STEPS.LBL_STEP_5: Verify and confirm the transaction details.
SHOW_TRANSACTION_STEPS.LBL_STEP_6: We will notify you once your payment has been received.

SHOWPOPUP.MESSAGE: provides custodial services for MoneyOwl. For more information, please refer to our FAQ.

QRCODE.TITLE: Scan & Pay by QR Code
QRCODE.DESC: Pay by scanning or saving this QR Code to your bank’s PayNow option.
QRCODE.ALT_STEPS: Alternatively, follow these steps to pay by entering UEN number.

ADVISER_MODAL.TITLE: Speak to Adviser
ADVISER_MODAL.DESC:
2-Hour Adviser Consultation For $49

You are strongly encouraged to have the 2-hour consultation session with our adviser to discuss your Comprehensive Financial Plan.

Most of our clients have found it more beneficial through the consultation session, as our adviser will be able to address any clarifications you have about your report.

For enquiries, you may wish to contact us at enquiries@moneyowl.com.sg.

APPOINTMENT_MODAL.TITLE: Make your Appointment
APPOINTMENT_MODAL.DESC:
Once payment is made, you will receive an email within 1-2 work days with steps to make your appointment with our adviser.

For enquiries, you may wish to contact us at enquiries@moneyowl.com.sg.
